dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT s.shipment_xid, dm.first_name || ' ' || dm.last_name AS document_mgr, sref.shipment_refnum_value AS booking_confirmation, loc.country_code3_gid destination_country, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd3.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd3 WHERE ssd3.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd3.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990') container_count, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd3.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd3 WHERE ssd3.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd3.stop_num = 1) - (SELECT COUNT(ssur.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd5 ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd5.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd5.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd5.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990') missing_container_count, TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,(SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1)),'MM/DD/YYYY') earliest_load_date, (CASE WHEN loc.country_code3_gid IN ('ARE','BGD') THEN TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,(SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1)) + 14,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,(SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1)) + 27,'MM/DD/YYYY') END) phyto_due_date, (CASE WHEN loc.country_code3_gid IN ('ARE','BGD') THEN TO_CHAR((glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,(SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1)) + 14) - (SYSDATE),'999') ELSE TO_CHAR((glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,(SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1)) + 27) - (SYSDATE),'999') END) days_to_phyto_due FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || sref.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid INNER JOIN location loca ON cv.dest_location_gid = loca.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_DOCUMENT_MANAGER dm ON dm.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON s.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE NOT loca.country_code3_gid = 'USA' AND s.shipment_gid in (SELECT DISTINCT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON ship.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid AND vsob.order_base_gid like 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' WHERE ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit ssu INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd1.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1) > (SELECT COUNT(ssur.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd2 ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd2.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd2.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd2.stop_num = 1))) AND NOT s.attribute_date10 IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT sref.shipment_gid FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value in ('5071','5078')) ) a ORDER BY TO_DATE(a.phyto_due_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ASC
